title: Alphabet's Stock Target Revised — TradingView News
text: Alphabet's stock has undergone adjustments in its price target by various research firms. Wolfe Research has increased the price target for Alphabet from $170.00 to $180.00 per share, maintaining an outperform rating. BMO Capital has also adjusted Alphabet's price target, raising it to $178 from $170, while maintaining an outperform rating. Redburn has revised Alphabet's price target to $165 from $150, continuing to hold a buy rating. Alphabet has an average rating of outperform with price targets ranging from $136 to $180.
